website_summaries.verdict: Young babies can enjoy water time with the family in this float equipped for the littlest of swimmers.
pros: Includes baby seat with 3-point adjustable harness
Works for babies who can't hold their heads up on their own
cons: Some floats arrive with leaky inflation chambers

customer_reviews.title: This float is amazing an just what we needed so our little beauty ...
customer_reviews.text: This float is amazing an just what we needed so our little beauty could enjoy the pool :). I have a 3month old daughter who loves the water an I was having to hold her bc she is still to tiny for your typical baby floats. That is until I found this one :) we got it yesterday an she loves it!!! Worth every penny :) She is so calm in this thing she actually ate an fell asleep in it lol. We did have to stick a towel behind her for a little ex support but other then that LOVE IT♡♡.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We use it all the time, in the water and on the sand. Essential!
customer_reviews.author: Sibilla

customer_reviews.title: Great product for infants!
customer_reviews.text: This float is a life saver in the pool this summer. My little one is 3 months and she loves this! Others on the market she wouldn’t be able to use until 6 months, so I’m very happy with this purchase. The only negative is that she leans to the left, not sure why, but hoping that will change the older she gets. I love being able to bring her in the pool with me, great product for infants! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MelCandyLizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float for newborn infants.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our little guy. You wouldn't want to use once they are big enough for others but this is great while they are little and not sitting on their own yet. It fits my 4 month 12.5 pounder great! The part where the baby lays a bit of a fabric feel to it. I was worried about it being hot plastic but it's not that way at all. We love this!
customer_reviews.author: DH1980

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for safety reasons
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this is the awning for sun protection. The float is very cheaply made and is not holding air for more than an hour or so. We aired it up for our trip but needless to say we won’t be taking it with us. I’m so disappointed and expected it to be so neat. The concept is wonderful and it looks great in the picture but in reality I don’t see this being able to hold my 14 lb baby out of the water very long. As a parent I want safe for my child so I wanted to inform parents of this before buying.
customer_reviews.author: julie garcia

customer_reviews.title: Neat little baby inflatable seat!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this inflatable baby seat. I did initially think that it kept the baby dry in the middle seat, I was wrong. Makes sense tho, so baby can enjoy the water too. My baby did not enjoy it when we used it for a cold springs, water was way too cold. (This is where i had thought it kept the baby dry, oops!) It did serve as a nice seat out and around for camping. If I had a regular pool it would be wonderful for that too. Great material and feels very nicely made and quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 month old loves it...so does the dog.
customer_reviews.text: Deflates after a day or so, so it is annoying to blow it up daily. BUT, totally worth the minor inconvience! My 4 month old LOVES this float, hasn't even used it in the pool yet because he just loves soaking up some sun and chilling on the porch in this. Our neighbor's small dog breed also LOVES this thing and sleeps in it regularly. (maybe the reason it is deflating lol). It seems safe and comfy. I would say it was totally worth theh money.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenn

customer_reviews.title: Takes on Water
customer_reviews.text: Good idea in general... your teeny baby can float around the pool when they’re too young to sit upright with their legs in the pool. My complaint is that this takes on water. Not from getting splashed or water going on top— it fills with water where the baby is laying somehow. Not sure if this is a flaw with mine or all of them. I realize you’re in a pool and bound to get a little wet but with a young baby I was hoping he wouldn’t be sitting in a puddle of water while in this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby on tropical vacation!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I’ve made in a long time. It was perfect for my 6 month old on our vacation to st Maarten. It was easy to inflate and traveled well. I was able to pack it in my carryon as it didn’t take up much space. The adjustable canopy worked great in keeping the sun out of the babies face and she was comfortable floating around the pool! So many other guests commented on how much she seemed to like it. I highly recommend this whether it’s for home or travel.
customer_reviews.author: nic1018

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a great floatie for babies but it's extremely safe! My baby falls asleep almost immediately and floats around the pool no problem. (Only complaint is there could be a little more sun protection). My experience is my 70lb 6yo nephew FELL ON TOP of my 4mo baby while he was in his floatie in the pool. It didn't even fully submerge his head underwater thank God. This is due to the multiple layers of air in this floatie. Def recommend! I've already convinced my mom friends to buy
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy or recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend it... waste of money!! Inflated the first tube then started with the second by the time I was done the first tube was deflated. Has a leak somewhere. I didn’t open it till we where ready to use it and it was 6 months later. Very disappointed. I like to shop for my trips in advance especially for kids and was disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: NATALY

customer_reviews.title: Love it but not perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best option on the market. My babe is 10 weeks and 14 lbs. He's big for his age but he kept sliding down in the sear androlling in the grooves on the right and left side of the seat. Even strapped in. Problem was fixed by rolling up some small towels on either side for stability. Minor as he is of course constantly supervised with me next to him.
customer_reviews.author: t-hart

customer_reviews.title: Takes FOREVER to inflate
customer_reviews.text: It was VERY difficult to inflate, and even more difficult to uninflate! Ultimately, my baby wanted to be IN the water, not floating on top out of it so this wasn't a good fit for us, but the hassle of setting it up and folding it to to travel would not be worth it anyway. I did appreciate that the sun roof has two different positions.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyn S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Newborns!
customer_reviews.text: The sun guard kept the sun out of my babies face and allowed for him to be outside longer then if it wouldnt have been there. The straps were good and he definitely has room to grow into it. He is just shy of 8 lbs and it seems to work well! We enjoy that the seat is actually out of the water and he can be included in the family pool.
customer_reviews.author: N.Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so does my 2 month old. It keeps the sun off of her and she can hang out and float around while we are cooling off in the pool. While it was blown up fully, the little pillow part they lay up on and have their head on was a little hard and she kept sliding to one side. I took some air just out of that one part, and it seemed to help, but she still seems most comfortable towards the edge of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele McGuff

customer_reviews.title: Giving this a Huge Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This float met and exceeded out expectations. The baby is above the water but you can let some air out to let them get a little wet as they get older. This is super portable as it comes in a compact carrying case. It is very sturdy and passed our test. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an infant baby float.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: Great little float for my little guy. The design allows water in so he can feel it and splash a little with his hands and feet. Sunshade is perfect so we don't have to worry about him burning up (still apply sunblock, of course!) overall higher quality product than I expected for the price of can't wait to get the next step up as he grows!
customer_reviews.author: C. Seeber

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and my baby even fell asleep in it. His butt sinks into the water so dont think they will stay up out of the water in this. My only issue is that the shade above when pulled back and button like its supposed to, its ends up being to far back and lets WAYYY to much sun in so me and dad rigged it by making a small hole in the other side and taking some string and tying to the front to keep the shade more centered.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money if you have a really little one. Our baby actually slept in this so we didn’t have to leave the pool for nap time. All other floaties are meant for infants that can sit up so this was perfect for those wobbly heads. The only small con is that because it’s air inside, it forces the baby’s head to lean to one side or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey.B

customer_reviews.title: Good floaty
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 3 month old (heavily supervised) for vacation. He did well in it and it ended up being a good purchase. I found it hard to inflate and had to get a pump. Fair warning- when it says not to overinflate it means it! I didn’t think I had (I inflated it as much as I normally would a floaty for myself) and it stretched it enough some of the seams popped open so that part of the inflatable is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute pool option for little babies that can’t hold their heads up out of the water. My son spent the whole time trying to sit up in it and didn’t really care for it. I like that the shade kept the sun off him but he didn’t really like the float. We’ve graduated to the one with the legholes and he likes that one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Voted baby's best pool accessory (by me)
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this baby floaty chair! It is awesome and the sun shade works extremely well. We use it for our son, he is 5 months old at the time of this posting and it makes every trip in the pool much more enjoyable. It keeps him out of the water and he is so secure that you could leave him by himself! But we wouldn't. Never leave a kiddo by himself.
customer_reviews.author: The Dickey's

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter so she could come in the pool with us when she was about 2 months. She's now 4 months and we've only used it twice. It's actually easier and more comfortable for me to just hold her up since she can hold her own head up now. The shade doesn't protect her from the sun so we had to still use an umbrella... so kind of a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten more use than I expected out of this float. A must for babies in a deep South summer. The shade hangs perfectly. My baby loves getting in his float. Most of the time he is so soothed he falls asleep. He will be ready to move to the spring float with leg holes soon but this float has been worth every penny for his 1st 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Float
customer_reviews.text: Love how it comes in travel bag & it’s easy to blow up & then pack to travel again. The only thing I would change is how the baby has to be laying so far back. My 10 week old needs this because she cannot sit up and does not have head control. However, it would be fun if it sat up higher for her to be able to see around— as she loves to look around at everyone and everything around her. A steeper incline would do so!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Lots of spots to fill in air so take a bit of time to blow up. Seat doesn’t keep baby in middle like pictures. Baby will lean to one side of seat so it frustrates my baby to not be able to sit normal. Overall it’s an okay product and does the job of keeping child afloat when I need to be in there pool watching my other child. Likely wouldn’t buy again if I had a redo.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter and Amber Clem

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old child LOVED this at the beach and pool. He was able to hang out with us in the water very comfortably. Not much water was on him due to the way the float is set up, which was great because it was a little chilly water. He laid back and took several naps!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: This float is awesome .. I don’t know why it’s 40% off but get it for sure! My baby is 2 months old and the waist strap is a little too big at its’ tightest, but she still laid comfortably in it. I was obviously not leaving her side while she was in it and she fell asleep she was so comfortable. Parts of her back, bottom and feet were in the water at times - not completely submerged - but if she were heavier they might be.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Just ok - does the job though
customer_reviews.text: Needs inflated almost every time to be sturdy enough. My daughter is 4 months and still slides around in it. So we have to put a towel in the side to keep her upright. It does keep the shade off of her nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: Baby seems to like it and keeps him mostly out of the water. his butt gets wet though so make sure there is a swim diaper. Easy to inflate. Wish the sun shade was a little taller and longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Popped after 5 minutes? Defective??
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this to come in. We inflated the raft, put our son on it in the pool on a hot day. He’s too young to “rough house” on it but it literally popped and blew out the side!?? I don’t know if we received a defective one but I am so upset. The loud pop scared our son and we got about 5 minutes of use out of this raft. Not a cheap raft for it to somehow pop like that??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has the 3 point harness which I like. The inner parts are inflatable and baby does ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to find a float for my 3 month old. This has the 3 point harness which I like. The inner parts are inflatable and baby does get wet in it. However, babe falls asleep while in the float so it serves its purpose! I would have given it 5 stars...But the sun shield only attaches in those places so we had to continuously turn him to keep him out of the sun...Even then his feet were in the sun a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: My two month old twins enjoyed lounging on these in and out of the water on the beach. I didn't expect any water to get on them but some water does get into the seat part, not close to their faces but enough to cool them off and get them familiar with water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. My little one falls asleep in it every time. He’s 3 months and this works great to keep him cool but not super wet. Makes it easier to manage both the kiddos in the pool as well. Hard to fold back up is the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Great for infants!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my baby! Started using when he was about 6 weeks old. He’s 3 months old now and still enjoying the float. It’s nice that some water can gather in the float to help keep baby cool but he’s not submerged. The shade helps to keep the sun away.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great float for infant
customer_reviews.text: Great float for infant. Son is 3 months old and he loves this. And mom loves it because i don’t have to worry about him in the water, he sits on top and only a little water comes in
customer_reviews.author: Ilyssa  Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Must have for moms! My baby loved this and going for a swim with her has been such an easy way to have fun without having to hold her constantly! She really enjoyed floating! The only part that is a pain is deflation and attempting to fold it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This float was everything I needed it to be! My little man is 9 weeks and weighs 11 pounds and he fit into this perfectly! It shields the sun just like I needed it to and it keeps him out of the water but with me while I cool off. It’s also great for him to nap in on the beach! This is the float to buy for your newborn, it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Packard

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this float!
customer_reviews.text: I love this float for my 2.5 month old. He is able to lay comfortably in it. The shaded part shades all of him except the bottom of his legs which I just throw a small burp cloth over. He does get wet which does not bother me because I want him used to the water. It floats nicely and I can slowly glide him through the water with ease. Everyone who sees this float is very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa M.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a pool + tiny baby you need this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She was born in May and we are usually in the pool all summer but it’s hard to find a pool float for a baby without neck control. This is what you need though! I wish the canopy had 2 snaps to adjust how far back it’s pulled to adjust for different sunlight but overall we love it!
customer_reviews.author: MrMrs Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Infant Float for the Pool
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this for both of my boys when they were infants and as gifts for friends. It is the best infant float. Supportive and cute. Easy to inflate (having a pump helps but possible to do by mouth) and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: LA0124

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Water soaks right threw it, body area filled with water every 5 or so minutes had to jeered pouring out from the top.... very disappointing since this is 35$
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Bray

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 3 month old
customer_reviews.text: This float was perfect for my 3 month old. It was just enough to wear she could put her feet in the water and her top half still stay dry. I felt like the strap was sturdy and didn’t budge at all when she started kicking away.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby V

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We brought this for our 4 month old grandson and he loved it. It was strong & sturdy and we felt it was very safe for him to use. It comes with a strap in belt & the canopy protected him from the harsh sun. His head was cushioned so it gave great support, so much so he fell asleep. As with any product like this adult supervision is a must. We loved it & so did our grandson. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for a baby who isn't sitting up yet
customer_reviews.text: Best thing for a baby who isn't sitting up yet. the sun canopy can be attached at all three places or just on each side, easy to adjust the angle then when top is unfastened. blows up in three places, let's a little water in but that's fine, once baby begins to sit up and wants to mobilize, might not be the best thing but it made it easy for mom, dad, and baby to float in the lake this year :)
customer_reviews.author: JMcCollum

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure some babies will like it but my son hates it!! It would be much better if there was a sharper angle (him sitting up a little bit more) and also if the toes could get wet I think the baby would enjoy that more ! It’s really just plopping the baby on top of the water, in my opinion doesn’t really “introduce” baby to water. I wish I could return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this float... Only to be so disappointed when it stopped holding air after only 2 uses. Soooo frustrating considering the price. Unfortunately, it’s going to have to be thrown away. The part that won’t hold air is essential to holding the baby upright. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lugrsi

customer_reviews.title: Must have for infant swimming!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old absolutely LOVES this, best purchase ever!! Baby just chills out while your hands are free to enjoy swimming too. My child has fallen asleep many of times in this from being so comfy in water and on shore at the lake. Must have for infant swimming!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmyne

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use at the river.. it had good reviews but for me it didn't work out.. when we inflated it one side didn't work so it was under water and my baby was side ways..
customer_reviews.author: laura estrada

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this float so much! It is worth every dollar! Our friends had a traditional one for their 6 month old (where they sit in it) and they used it one time. We used ours over and over again! One of my Best Buy’s!
customer_reviews.author: William Willis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy it for our 3 month old as we decided to go on vacation but we ended up using it only once and now we are not going to use it again Other than that the material is really good and the design is nice
customer_reviews.author: mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Keeps baby floating, but not dry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 month old to introduce to the pool. It fits her well, I don't like that it allows water to seep into where the baby sits. So she constantly has a wet butt. I thought she would not be getting wet, but that isn't the case. Also, the cover doesn't cover all the baby in the sun. Overall, it's good for the price. The baby will only fit in it for this summer anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 3 month old to get him in the water safely with me. I just wish he was able to sit up in it opposed to just laying down. Other than that it’s the perfect float.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanke Tiffanie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool
customer_reviews.text: The only negative was I had to get a knife to poke hole in the holes to blow air through. They were all closed off. It was kind of annoying but once I punctured the holes, it aired up quickly. Love that it has shade with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pietras

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this I do wish there were some head support but I just moved her on one side fully and she did great. She loved floating and ended up falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies that dont sit up yet
customer_reviews.text: Great for babies under 6 months Easy to blow up and doesn't take up much storage space. Baby sort of leans to the side bit seems comfy. I like that it keeps baby out of water for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a little pricey but it worked perfectly. We got a lot of use out of it this summer. My infant slept in it every time and provided the perfect shade for him.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: it is overwhelming big, but serves purpose. baby does still get wet, but that is okay; floats good and secure enough.
customer_reviews.author: traindisp

customer_reviews.title: Snap broke right away
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this product only 1 star, although my daughter seemed to find it comfortable. One of the snaps to hold the shaded piece on broke the very first time I used it. Also it was difficult to inflate. Once I had it inflated my 2 month old daughter slept in it in the pool for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to inflate and deflate! Doesn't do a good job at blocking the sun. What're easily gets in and starts to weigh it down or sits in there so if you have a breeze your baby will get cold.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a beach trip in April that got canceled due to Covid. Just tried using this for the first time this week. We blew it up and the next day it was deflated. It can’t seem to keep its air. The inner seat where our baby sat was off-centered and the padding causes her to fall to one side. If it kept its air and was padded correctly in the center, this would probably be great. Wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for infants!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👍👍👍👍❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Great color Vibrant Easy to use Works well Safe in the pool for my 4 month old grandson
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Lynn Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to where baby can be when family swims
customer_reviews.text: I love this little floaty. It’s perfect for my three month old. The sunshade is great. I just cover my baby with a damp towel to protect his skin, and keep him cool if the floaty turns into the sun. This product has helped me so much. If this baby was my only child I would keep him indoors to avoid the sun & heat exposure. However, I have another child who wants to swim. Like this, I can be in the water with both children, and baby gets to be part of the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn E Houpt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger babies to relax in
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for my baby that just isn’t quite ready to sit up on his own. Very comfortable for him with a good inclined seat. The only issue is with the canopy piece, the one I received is a little bent and it makes it a little wonky and I can’t fold it properly to put it back into the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's perfect for babies who aren't sitting up yet unassisted. As others said yes they tend to lean to one side but that doesn't bother me. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bottom popped when inflating
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my grandson. When we inflated it for the first time the seat part popped. Cant use it as there is no cushion for him to sit on, would love to exchange it but by the time we had a chance to use it the return window had expired by a little over a week
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nosworthy,Amy Nosworthy

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo was not happy with the angle of the seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea but my child refused to use it and would cry every time we tried to use it. He was not a fan of the angle it had him laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Super uneven
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but unfortunately it’s just not worth the money. My lo hates it and I don’t blame him because he practically falls out the thing cause he leans to one side an is too long for It at 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Silver

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 month old. He really seemed comfortable and enjoyed being in the water while using this float. He is 7 months old now and we still use it some because he does not try to sit up or roll out of it yet. (We always keep our hand on it.) The buckles and everything seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Infants
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my 5 month year old! Great product that allowed him to enjoy the pool and made me feel comfortable that he was safely secure
customer_reviews.author: CGoode

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Its very good quality and fairly easy to inflat. My 1 month old isnt a fan of ut just yet as he doesnt enjoy the water yet but hopefully he will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: A great product to keep baby safe from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great must have for a little one keeps the sun off while enjoying the water
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our 3 month old. We went to the lake and he napped in this on the water for an hour. He absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: 3 month
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the first time and my 3 month old loves it. Just the perfect amount of water on his bum to keep him cool. The shade protector is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby's Intro to the Pool
customer_reviews.text: So cute! It's very stable and seems to be comfy. The adjustable harnesss is secure. We love the canopy! Keeps baby cool without sitting in a huge puddle of water.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love this little floaty
customer_reviews.text: Love this little floaty. I only used it for about two months (from when my son was two to four months old). After about four months old my son wanted to be able to look around more in the pool. I'm only giving it 4 stars instead of 5 as it's a little on the pricey side for using it for such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: ncosta

customer_reviews.title: Baby isn’t in water
customer_reviews.text: Baby is completely out of the water.. I suggest getting one where your baby’s feet can be in the water. Otherwise your baby isn’t even ‘swimming’.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Aeschliman

customer_reviews.title: Great infant float
customer_reviews.text: Perfect float for new babies. Sun shade helps keep baby safe from the sun
customer_reviews.author: kassie

customer_reviews.title: Gave me freedom with two kids!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this floaty! Perfect for my newborn! I can float him around while i play with my two yearold daughter and i dont have to have another adult there to help me!! Previously i had to bring someone to help me wrangle them!
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind
customer_reviews.text: Works great for newborns before they can lift their heads. Its nice to be able to bring my newborn into the pool. He is a summer baby
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Derck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this float! My daughter is 2 almost 3 months and it’s perfect for her. I even use it for Her on the beach to keep the sun off her. (She’s crying because it was her first time in the water) but she has gotten used to it now and really likes it! Very sturdy and worth the money😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A decent buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing float for my 3mo old. He hates the water and this keeps him out of it for the most part. Good for on the beach to because the sun canopy. Only complaint is that he leans to one side all the time. We just roll up a Muslim swaddle blanket to help position him straight.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Rinnman

customer_reviews.title: Great float for baby!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this! She enjoys splashing the water where it sits in the edges of the float. The shade is great because it can be positioned back or forward. It has handles for you to hold onto while you're swimming around. Great for a pool or on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Freda

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: Overall great, only drawback is the shape of the seat. It forces his chin onto his chest which is not ideal. Seat needs to have a better shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mark James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this float. I purchased it to keep my 2 month old dry while being with us in the pool, the float gets water inside the seating area for the baby. I’ve attempted to blow it up more and less, keeps happening. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: p mazz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool float for newborns!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old LOVES this infant baby swim float! The 3 point adjustable harness wraps around the waist and is soft, so even if he’s not wearing his rash guard swim suit it won’t irritate his skin. The incline of the seat is comfortable positioning for him to float safely. I love that it keeps him dry and has handles for us to keep him close with ease. The sun canopy can easily be adjusted with the snap closures.
customer_reviews.author: Jennea Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 month old daughter to use in the pool for summer. Especially since we live in south Florida and the heat is unbearable!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reed

customer_reviews.title: But it. It’s great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great float. Very well made. Was very happy with this purchase for my infant.
customer_reviews.author: Yvo1234

customer_reviews.title: need canopy
customer_reviews.text: I got one and it had a small hole and deflated while in the water. I bought another one through Amazon recently and the adjustable canopy was bent and does not fit correctly. Sun still gets in my granddaughter's eyes. I am going to reach out to Amazon and see if another canopy can be sent because without it this doesn't satisfy our needs.
customer_reviews.author: EVIE SMITH

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. It is great to use for my grandson and to be able to be with him in the pool. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great product. Yes you have to blow it up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. Yes you have to blow it up manually, but there is not much you need to blow up. The cover keeps the baby sun free yet allows her to be in the pool. Just so happy with this float.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brown

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that we bought this. My baby girl (4 months) is so happy in it. Make sure you have swimgear with full coverage though, the sunshade doesn't provide a whole lot of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Best for Newborn Babies
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this at the beginning of summer for my 3 month old and he was already too big for it. It wasn't my favorite as he was elevated out of the water and trying to sit up in it because he leaned so far back. I ended up selling it because I didn't really have any use for it. I do think it would be good for babies less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Owens

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our four month old when we went on vacation. The canopy provides good shade from the sun and is removable if not needed. He thought it was comfortable, and even fell asleep in it a few times. It’s sturdy and durable and safe, & was so convenient for us to have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay afloat
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this doesn’t stay inflated we only use it for about 30 min at a time and my daughter is already starting to sink in it .
customer_reviews.author: lida

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Worked great kept the baby in the shade and cool .
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 months old and loves the water. This made it so much easier to take him swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Great for water introduction!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 1 month old. It works great as long as we support his head with our hands. We really like it, it would be perfect for a 4 to 5 month old with a little more head control.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Prather

customer_reviews.title: Great for a newborn!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves floating around in this. Started use at 3 months old (1 month premature) at about 9lbs and she did great. It does get there bottoms a little wet but they are fully supported in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product when it holds air
customer_reviews.text: The outer ring will not hold air. Blew it up for the first time after taking it out of the box and it wouldn’t hold. Extremely disappointed, especially with how much we paid for it. And of course by the time I opened it to use it it was already out of the return window. The 30 minutes it holds air though the float is awesome, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SwimWays Infant Baby Spring Float with Adjustable Sun Canopy - Blue
product_meta.description: The SwimWays Infant Baby Spring Float with Sun Canopy is a fabric-covered baby float for ages 3 months until baby attempts to climb out or sit up (approximately 9 months). This infant float features a soft seat with an adjustable 3-point harness to keep baby secure. Additional features include dual-inflation chambers, safety valves, a wide base with an inner spring around the outside edge of the float for stability, and a removable/adjustable sun canopy with UPF 50+ sun protection. Built-in handles make it easy for mom or dad to hold the float securely at all times. Folds flat into 3 compact rings for portability and storage. Carry case included. Sold individually.
feature_bullets: SWIM STEPS: Baby water float designed to help infants and parents relax and enjoy the water introduction experience
ULTIMATE COMFORT: Fabric-covered float features a soft fabric seat to keep your baby comfortable while built-in handles are included so mom or dad can hold the baby float securely at all times

SAFETY MINDED: Features a 3-point adjustable harness, dual inflation chambers, child safety valves for security, and a patented inner spring which gives greater stability in the water. Removable canopy offers UPF 50+ sun protection
PORTABLE: Folds easily for storage and transport in the included convenient carry case - it’s a great pool float for travel!
DIMENSIONS: Measures 34"L x 30"W x 20.5"H; Recommended for babies age 9-24 months

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
